<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Fix Infrastructure as Code Configuration Errors</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/code/api/v1/fixes/checkov"}></MethodEndpoint>



Suggest a fix for infrastructure as code configuration errors that are found in the request files.

## Request
